To convert a value from one currency to another, it is quite simple. 

 First you must know how much your currency unit is worth to another. 

Example: R $ 1.00 BRL (Reais) is worth $ 0.18 USD (American Dollars), so if you want to know the conversion of a value, just multiply the value with the quotation of your currency to the other. 

 Example:
To find out the unit value of the other currency for yours, just divide the value by the result obtained from the conversion.
Now to perform the reverse operation, just multiply by the desired value.
